column1: Little Goat Diner////Went to Little Goat with an old friend expecting the best and felt disappointed afterwards. We had the Bull's Eye French Toast
column4: all of which came recommended by our server (who was super cool
column5: btw). It was really standard fare and nothing really blew us away. The kimchi in the pork chop was over-salted and the fried chicken tasted like it came from a Tyson bag...but worse. I did really enjoy the Iced Little Goat (latte with goat's milk)
column6: which was delightfully rich and delicious. However
column7: I don't think it's worth coming back for the food.
